rows.label: qev016901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Glad you're here, [ST:playername ].
I've been waiting for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0002
rows.name:
You're the only one I know who can handle this,
so let's get you briefed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0011
rows.name: Listen attentively.

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0020
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that you're done being her gopher.

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0003
rows.name:
What, is this beneath you? Should I only have
you engage in boss fights or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Besides, I think you'll agree the reward is fair,
so at least hear me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0005
rows.name:
As you know, New LA now has a number of
nonhuman residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0006
rows.name:
Thanks to these xenoforms, we've seen leaps in our
technology and an exponential growth in trade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Unfortunately, our miranium consumption has also
spiked to an alarming degree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0008
rows.name:
The amount we're excavating with our existing data
probes simply can't keep up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'd like to ask your help in mining enough to get us out
of this bind... Perhaps by expanding your FrontierNav
grid further out into Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0010
rows.name:
And while you're out in Oblivia, I've got a few other
objectives you can take care of there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0011
rows.name:
First, I need you to gather seven or so moleworms.
Those ugly little things consume miranium,
which makes them quite valuable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0012
rows.name:
And then I want you to retrieve data unit FN095.
We're pretty sure it landed somewhere on the continent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0013
rows.name: Should be simple enough, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0014
rows.name:
And I'll make sure to tell the xenoforms bemoaning a
lack of materials that I've got our ace BLADE operative
on the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0015
rows.name: No pressure now! Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0030
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that you're the sharpest BLADE in the drawer.

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0041
rows.name: Look panicked and shift nervously from foot to foot.

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0016
rows.name:
The sharpest... Yowza. That's really bad.
But whatever! Now get out there and prove me right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0017
rows.name:
You're awfully nervous for someone with your track
record, you know? You're going to be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0018
rows.name: Good luck. And thanks, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0019
rows.name:
Thanks again. Oh, and as always, I'll let you tackle the
objectives in whatever order you see fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0020
rows.name:
Just make sure to expand FrontierNav and start
mining that ridiculous amount of miranium I asked
for, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0021
rows.name: Wow. You got all 2,500 units of miranium already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thanks so much. Now I can keep NLA's new residents
stocked and happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0023
rows.name: Good luck with the remaining objectives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0024
rows.name:
I forwarded the miranium along to the waiting
xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now you just have to take care of the objectives in
Oblivia. Don't worryâ€”I'm sure you'll ace 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0026
rows.name:
Phew! The Ma-non are ravenous when it comes to
learning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0027
rows.name:
Now that they've seen how much miranium FrontierNav
brings in, they want to know all about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0028
rows.name:
They keep lining up to ask me questions.
Some of them even follow me around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0029
rows.name: I feel like some kind of crazy college professor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0050
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that she has a gift for teaching.

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0060
rows.name: Discourage

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0061
rows.name: Say Kirsty is in no position to teach anything.

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0030
rows.name:
Heh. Guess I gave you a crash course on FrontierNav
not too long ago, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0031
rows.name:
I see someone forgot their jerk pills today.
And someone ALSO forgot who it was that taught
[ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] about FrontierNav in the first place![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0032
rows.name:
Anyway, that takes care of all the objectives for this
assignment. Good work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0033
rows.name:
It looks like the information on the data unit is intact,
to boot. I'll make sure you get your reward right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Damn. Doesn't look like these guys plan to go home
anytime soon, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm a bit exhausted from the hailstorm of questions,
but what are you going to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0036
rows.name:
And to be honest, it's a little flattering to have people
so interested in my work. I helped develop FrontierNav,
after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that all humanity should be proud of FrontierNav.

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0080
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Kirsty about her role in FrontierNav's development.

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0037
rows.name:
I'm glad you think so. I know the rest of the team
would be as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0038
rows.name:
Er, actually that's classified information, so maybe you
can just...forget you heard it? Geez, I need to learn to
shut my big mouth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0039
rows.name: Anyway, that was forever ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0040
rows.name:
Oh, and I'm not sure if you've heard, but apparently
there's a Ma-non out there who's offering credits for
miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0041
rows.name:
I guess you can accept requests from her through
Mission Control. Take a look, if you're curious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0042
rows.name:
It's something a person like you could probably make
good use of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0090
rows.name: Deliver[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0091
rows.name: Hand over the 2,500 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_JNK0100
rows.name: Keep[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_SEL0101
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016901_MSG0043
rows.name:
Come on, I've got a million xenoforms breathing down
my neck for this stuff. You're killing me here![ST:wait ]
